entry.title: 12 Pack - 1.5" Silver Dripless Unscented Votive Candles - Long Lasting Candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3820
Type: Decorations
Price: 9.49

[About]

1 Qty: 12 Votive Candles
Material: Wax, Cotton (Wick)
Color: Silver
Style: Votive Candle
Overall Height: 1.5"
Candle Diameter:1.5"
Burn Time:5 - 8 Hours
Features: Long Burn Time, Lead Free, Unscented, Dripless and REAL WAX
Perfect for Home, Weddings, Churches, Restaurants, and Events
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Note:

For a dripless candle to remain dripless, burning conditions must be ideal. The candle has to stand up vertically, not even at a slight angle. Keep the dripless candle away from drafts (air conditioning, fans, outdoors, window draft) as well, as a slight breeze could cause the flame to flare up larger than usual or to touch areas of wax that it normally wouldn’t reach, causing drips.

entry.title: Caribbean Island Beach Candles Favors | 4 PCS | Gift Wrapped with Clear PVC Box & Thank You Tag
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5340
Type: Decorations
Price: 3.99 - 179.99 (2 variants)

[About]

QTY: 4 Candle Favors / Order
Height: 5/8”
Diameter: 1”
Burn Time: Approx. 3-4 Hours 
Design: Sea Shell
Accessories: Plastic Gift Box
Sale is for Seashell Candle and its accompanying favor box only; other decorative accessories not included.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

    Lets surround ourselves with the exotic company of cool sea breeze, smoothly flowing sea waves, the chirping seagulls and the refreshing smell of an ocean. To organize an event by the seaside is an enchanted dream that you can now live most vividly with the soft, luminous glow of our sweet Caribbean Island Beach Candles. Celebrate your wedding reception, a birthday party, graduation dinner, a family get-together, or a romantic dinner with your beloved right by the sea-side. Brighten up the atmosphere with these candles lit amorously around you, play around the sandy beach, breathe in the fresh ocean air, and squirt water at each other, the list of beach-fun activities are endless! Enhance the romanticism of your ambiance by adding our beach theme candles that have sea shells, stars fish, seaweeds and clam embellishments. So, go ahead and indulge in a perfectly quixotic beach festivity with these sweet sparkles of love lighting up the entire ambiance for you or giveaway these lovely favors to your guests to let them steal some romantic moments of togetherness in the company of ocean breeze and water!

    Additional Information: 

    • One order is for 4 assorted candles that come in a giveaway ready box
    • Weather may affect conditions of the candles if left in extreme heat or when shipping to a hot state; please understand and take these factors into consideration when making your purchase decision.
    • Uses: Wedding Favor, Party Favor, Baby Shower, Birthday Favor, Gift, Decoration
